alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 11 at 1:37PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, except 6 to 19 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph, significantly reducing visibility to near zero. * WHERE...Shoshone/Lava Beds, Lower Snake River Plain, Eastern Magic Valley, Southern Hills/Albion Mountains, and Raft River Region, including but not limited to Shoshone, Richfield, Carey, Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, Fort Hall, Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley, Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, and Holbrook. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
